content.about_intro: Hi... I'm Nikos, a web developer based in Berlin, Germany.
content.about_text: My main area of expertise is front-end web development of web apps. With a strong focus on cross-device & browsers optimisation, continuously learning and keeping track on new technologies that can improve my daily workflow.
content.interests: Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors (well...as long the weather allows it!). With my wife we love travelling and discovering the nature. Hiking, basketball and tennis are some of my favourite activities. In the cold winter days, Netflix, NBA and cooking are the antidotes. I'm born and raised in Athens Greece, which means... cooking delicious Greek food is my duty! I'm a BIG fan of TESLA & SpaceX and in general I like researching about new technologies that can improve our life quality & change the way we see our world!

projects.title: Farm Nation
projects.text: Farm Nation was a full stack project for a gaming platform with online farming games. It was built from scratch, based on Laravel framework.

projects.title: Plinga Games
projects.text: A login / register page used from www.plinga.com. Facebook login, form validation & page restyling were some of my main responsibilities.

projects.title: SpaceXscanner
projects.text: An App which uses the open source API of SpaceX to track past and future space flights. Was created with Express, GraphQL, React, React Hooks, React Router and Bulma framework.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.text: My personal website. Was built with React, React Hooks, React Router, Axios and Bootstrap 4 framework.
